resources.string: Reflecting the diversity of Lesotho’s landscapes, Afriski offers experiences to suit just about everybody, no matter what season it is and what you’re into.

String-array.name: description
String-array.item: Reflecting the diversity of Lesotho’s landscapes, Afriski offers experiences to suit just about everybody, no matter what season it is and what you’re into.
The tall, deep rock overhangs that characterise the highlands of Lesotho have provided shelter to human since time immemorial.
Located 24km outside of the city of Maseru, Thaba Bosiu is a National Monument and Lesotho's foremost tourist destination…
Sehlabathebe National Park, the oldest nature reserve in the country, is remote and almost inaccessible but predictably peaceful and stunningly beautiful.
Malia Lodge offers a range of accommodation types including 5 Star Luxury and 3 Star self-catering.
Maletsunyane Falls is a 192-metre high waterfall in Southern African country Lesotho
Sani Mountain Lodge is situated on the border between South Africa and Lesotho, sitting 2874m above sea level.
